titles: A pleasant new ballad of King Edward the fourth, and a tanner of Tamworth, as he rode a hunting with his nobles to Drayton Basset. To an excellent new tune.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clarke.,
notes: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
keywords: Edward --  IV, --  King of England, 1442-1483 --  Poetry.
